data.external_ip: External Address (optional, for advanced network setups)

data_description.external_ip: Override auto-detected address with an IP address or hostname. Leave blank for automatic detection. Use for Kubernetes/Docker setups or when behind a reverse proxy. Ports 3030 and 3031 will be appended automatically.

fdm_options.title: FDM Printer Options
fdm_options.description: Configure additional options for your selected printer. See the project's GitHub page for more information about the proxy server.

resin_options.title: Resin Printer Options
resin_options.description: Enabling the camera can create instability in the printer. Use at your own risk. See the project's GitHub page for details and best practices.

cc2_options.title: Centauri Carbon 2 Options
cc2_options.description: Configure your Centauri Carbon 2 printer. If your printer has access code authentication enabled, enter your access code below. Leave blank if no access code is required.

cc2_auth_check.title: Centauri Carbon 2 Authentication
cc2_auth_check.description:
**IMPORTANT:** Check your printer's access code setting before continuing.

On your printer, go to: **Settings → Network → Access Code**

• If the setting shows 'Off' or is blank/empty, select **No**
• If you have set a custom access code, select **Yes**

Most printers ship with no access code by default.

data.requires_access_code: Does your printer require an access code?

cc2_access_code_input.title: Enter Access Code
cc2_access_code_input.description: Find your printer's access code at: Settings → Network → Access Code

error.connection: Unable to connect to the printer.

error.manual_options_no_printer_found: The selected printer could not be found to apply options.
error.init_no_printer_found: Failed to initialize: The printer could not be found.
error.cc2_options_no_printer_found: The CC2 printer could not be found.
error.cc2_access_code_required: This printer requires an access code for authentication.
error.cc2_authentication_failed: Failed to authenticate. Verify access code in printer settings: Settings → Network → Access Code.
